body.p:
Lexington Ky Sept 21st 1864
Gov. T. E. Bramlette
Governor
Permit me to recommend to your Excellency. For the vacant majority in the 11th Ky Cav. Capt Wm Mangan of Co M. same Regt vice W. O Boyle promo

I am as Ever Governor
Your obt servt
W. O. Boyle
Lt Col 11th Ky Cav

11 Cavy
Lexington Ky
Sept 21. 1864
Boyle W. O.
Lt. Col.
Recommends Capt. Mangan for the position of Major 11: Ky Cavy
Issue if vacancy
D W Lindsey

Com issued & forwd
Septr. 21. 1864
Recd A. G. O. Septr 21. 1864

Issue Commission
T E Bramlette
Govr
